Designing a submersible vehicle that can withstand the extreme pressure of the deep sea and is equipped with advanced technology to explore and document the ocean floor.

Developing a team of highly skilled and experienced oceanographers, engineers, and divers who are dedicated to the mission and have the necessary training and expertise to navigate the challenges of the deep sea.
Creating a detailed plan that outlines theoles to be explored, theoles to be studied, and the goals of the mission.
Partnering with leading scientific institutions and organizations to fund and support the mission, and to share the findings and discoveries with the global community.
Launching a public awareness campaign to inspire and motivate people to support the mission and to learn more about the wonders and mysteries of the deep sea.
